text: Hey everyone, I am creating a custom UI extension using React on the deals page, but I dont seem to figure out how to get the record data that isnt the base "context". The extension itself should have a way to do that no?

Hello anybody knows if there are some issues open? In last hour or two any css changes will only apply to the editors, but wont apply to the live page, even if i republish it. (Tried the incognito mode aswell)

Hi everyone,
I need help regarding storing and capturing GCLID (referrer_url, utm_medium, utm_source) in google tag manager. In screenshot 1 : I have created these hidden fields. In screenshot 2 : I have created a GCLID script.

I am a bit confused how to track and store hidden fields defined in the HubSpot form in google tag manager. If any one has any idea then please let me know. Thank you!!
i have a little problem with apis response.
like  when i  the contact to CRM
and missed email
then it returns 400 status code
and when i push the same data then it returns 409 status code
which basically goes into catch block coz it's a error.
so my question is why don't you return status code 200 and send response that you are pushing dublicated data
or just tell in response that you didn't passed email that is why we will not push  your contact to CRM
just let us know in response why you sending 400 and 409 status code. your can send this response with 200 status code also
:slightly_smiling_face: thanks for listening.
Hi everyone! Is there possibility on HubSpot to test Transactional emails for developers?
Hi Daniel, sorry for the delay here, was out of office last week. Is this still happening?

Hello Everyone!!!
I’m using the *view dependents feature of HubSpot* to view in which pages a module is being used. But I have a module that says that is used in 417 pages, and I open SEVERAL like 30 pages and the module is not there, does anyone know how to solve this? I don’t want to check the 417 pages
Do HubSpot membership sites need a unique domain? Or can it be used on the same domain as your main website?
same domain works - you set the membership access per page and it's based on a list
Excellent, thank you Jennifer. Wanted to make sure I wasn't going to break something
You're welcome!
no, it's fine now. Happened for me all day yesterday but it seems to be working nw

Hello everyone, :smiley:
I'm excited to be a part of the HubSpot community. I bring a background in Salesforce Marketing Cloud and exploring new freelance opportunities.

I've been on a two-year journey through the marketing cloud landscape, diving into Ampscript, SSJS, Email Studio, Automation Studio, Journey Builder, and Marketing Cloud APIs, among other areas. I'm also proud to hold certifications in Salesforce Marketing Cloud, including email specialist, admin, and developer.

I'm eager to connect with fellow community members to broaden my knowledge and understanding of HubSpot. I'm here to engage in conversations, learn from all of you, and exchange ideas. Let's embark on this journey together!
